suncertify.server
Interface Services

All Known Subinterfaces:
RemoteServices
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteServicesImpl, ServicesImpl
public interface Services

This interface is the primary API through which clients access a local database server.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Gregory Biegel

Method Summary

          Adds a contractor to the database.

Method Detail

book

public boolean book(int id,
                    long customerID)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    RecordNotFoundException,
                    java.lang.SecurityException
Books a contractor in the database.

Parameters:
id - the identifier of the contractor to book
customerID - the CSR under which to book the contractor
Returns:
true if the contractor was booked, else false
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - thrown if the contractor was not found
java.io.IOException - thrown if there is a problem accessing the database file
java.lang.SecurityException - thrown if the record is locked by another user

unBook

public boolean unBook(int id)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      RecordNotFoundException,
                      java.lang.SecurityException
Unbooks a contractor in the database.

Parameters:
id - the identifier of the contractor to unbook
Returns:
true if the contractor was unbooked, else false
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - thrown if the contractor was not found
java.io.IOException - thrown if there is a problem accessing the database file
java.lang.SecurityException - thrown if the record is locked by another user

find

public java.util.List find(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String location)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Finds contractors that match the specified search criteria.

Parameters:
name - the name to search for
location - the location to search for
Returns:
the list of contractors which match the search criteria
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown if there is a problem accessing the database file

deleteContractor

public void deleteContractor(int id)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             RecordNotFoundException,
                             java.lang.SecurityException
Deletes a contractor from the database.

Parameters:
id - the identifier of the contractor to delete
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown if there is a problem accessing the database file
RecordNotFoundException - thrown if the contractor is not found to delete
java.lang.SecurityException - thrown if record is locked by another user

addContractor

public void addContractor(java.lang.String[] data)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Adds a contractor to the database.

Parameters:
data - an array containing the contractor record data to add
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown if there is a problem accessing the database file

Gets the list of contractors.

Returns:
